title: R.I.P. Riot when Replays come out!
body:
Their Bug-fixing team will be working overtime, because everyone will finally be able to record _(and prove)_ all the bullshit that happens in games.

There will be no hiding from it then.

So looking forward to this! ;)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: They wont do any more than they do now.
your acting as if people cant record already

Most of the population don't record.

Its a huge jump up from only the wannabes, good players and youtubers recording. to EVERYONE recording.
